parameters:
\nc<Saki>Sigh... What's this feeling? Even though it's a weekend
morning.
\nc<Saki>I feel so sluggish... I don't think I can get up...

\bustMsgExp[1, 0]\nc<Saki>Maybe I should take a break today... It's fine on the
weekend, right?

\nc<Senpai>Saki? Sorry to bother you, but can you come to the office
right away? A client insisted that they 'need Saki
specifically.'

\nc<Senpai>I'll treat you to dinner. How long do you think it will
take?
\bustMsgExp[1, 2]\nc<Saki>It's just... I think I've caught a cold... Cough! Cough!

\nc<Saki>I'm really sorry to the client... but it seems I really
can't make it to work today.

\nc<Senpai>It's the weekend, so I'll let it slide this time. But there
won't be a next time.
\bustMsgExp[1, 0]\nc<Saki>Phew... Did I manage to deceive her?
